helpTexts.li:
Colonists will often have to stop what they are doing to fetch a drink of water.

You can reduce this wasted time by making waterskins or canteens for your colonists, so they can always carry some water around with them.

Do this at a tailor's workbench or smithing bench.
Save time by storing water near places where it is needed -- build cisterns or water troughs.
If there is no natural water source on the map, you can dig an IMPROVISED WELL for your colonists.
